title: Okay...so what happened?
body:
Was in a game, we won... gave honors to teammates, etc... get out to home screen get a pop-up:

"There is a problem with your connection. If you are not currently connected to the internet, please do so. If you are already on-line but cannot connect to League of Legends, check the support page"

restarted the game, and the same thing came up, but a new one underneath showed up after the 2nd time

These Live incidents may have caused this:
"Account transfers are unavailable on the beta client. Please launch the legacy client if you would like to transfer".

I have not ordered a transfer, I'm connected to the internet (obviously), troubleshooted connection, repaired client, still nothing. Server status seems fine as well unless I'm missing something.

replies.body: Worked for me! It was only popping that warning up occasionally and messing up my champion select, but then it started popping up every time I opened the client (not even allowing me to hit "Legacy Client"), so I used your method and it worked and I'ma just use the old client until they work the bugs out; as I'm assuming that's why everything is messing up now.
Didn't think it would, but surprisingly worked for me as well. Gonna follow everyone else's tracks and stick to the legacy client until bugs are acknowledged and resolved.{{summoner:13}}

just gonna post an update. Tried setting it to google's Public DNS... managed one game and the got the message again. Hit alt + F4 got the "are you sure you want to exit" hit NO, got d/c'd from chat but can still join lobbies...

Not really sure wtf is going on, but I guess back to legacy client it is? Unless people are having issues with it as well?

I can confirm this worked for me, thanks!
Reverted back to Legacy client, idk if it works for Alpha.

using the different DNS didn't help, same with running as admin...however game seems to be fine for me regardless. For now.

Edit: Scratch that... got into the client for 2 minutes and was talking to someone and it happened again...
Hmm... I'd be interested to know how many people are East coast, or central vs West...Something tells me there is an outage somewhere that is redirecting traffic.
Eastern coast here. Same thing happening to me.
Update: I got on! I went right to the legacy client though because I wonder if it's a problem with the beta client. If you haven't already, try now!

same problem... i managed to click the launch legacy client, told me firewall is blocking instead of the "There is a problem with your connection"
relaunched and doing a repair right now ill post results
We believe in you, Bardlord-Senpai! :O

happend to me twice now. had to reboot. me and and friend freezed one after another in two champ selects, unable to select a champ. then it didnt let me log in after i used alt + f4. the next champ select worked but then i got kicked out of the game after having lag spikes (24 ping, connection in browser was perfectly fine). again i was unable to login until i rebooted. lost this game obviously. i lost 3 points for the champ select and ~15 points for the game. and alot of time and nerves. please riot acknowledge that your client/server is going to hell atm. its not only me
There might have been a network issue for some players, but I'm unable to see any problems currently.  Are you able to login now?

changing DNS and run as admin did not work for me, But if you guys shut the game down long enough (don't use the restart one) and open the client again, you should have enough time to click on the legacy client. Legacy client works great for me so far. Hope this help!!! :)
Just ran it as admin and haven't had any problems since.

I couldn't get it to work and kept restarting it, out of habit I guess, once time I just right clicked it on the taskbar and hit close and little popup came on the league client with the "are you sure you want to close?" deal. I hit No and the no internet connection error disappeared and I typed in my password.
Having a same issue... urghh I just want to play a game
Just got home, expecting to play my favorite game... same problem.{{item:3070}}

yeah full repair didnt do squat guess ima going back to sleep

edit : it did tell me that it "downgraded" the client in order to "update" it... i never noticed it do either one so idk
This is almost definitely a Riot server-side thing.  If that is the case, there is nothing we can do but be patient until they fix it.  Let the waiting game begin!

Don't worry, did this not too long ago (still had the error message search in my URL).
New client has more bugs than {{champion:82}}

(To get back into client: attempt to close it in quick menu, say no. This will open home page. Play button will flash in and out - gotta catch it quick to play a game)

UPDATE: Successfully started an aram match
Just got it myself
Have the same issue! Bumping for it to get more attention.
I am having the same problem
I ran the game as an administrator and it worked. have fun boys.

Well this worked for me so far, i was able to login

EDIT: nvm
